a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Corruption Perception Index vs. share of people who have bribed,
The horizontal axis shows scores in the Corruption Perception Index (lower values reflect higher perceived corruption). The
vertical axis shows the percentage of people who report having paid a bribe to access public services in the last year.
Share of people who have bribed
Data source: Transparency International - GCB (2017); Our World in Data; Transparency International (2018)
